attributes.action: Consider Sir David Attenborough for the £5, £10 or £20 note
attributes.additional_details: He deserves the recognition from the world
attributes.background: He's a hero - all he does is to educate the Planet to care for our planet.

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here:
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
